appDescription.message: A neutral new tab page accented with a chosen colour. Customise the layout, style, background and bookmarks in nightTab.

menuContentThemePresetHelperPara1.message: Applying a Preset will replace the current Color, Accent, Font, Style, Radius, Shadow, Shade and Background.

menuContentThemeSavedHelperPara1.message: Saving a Theme will record the current Color, Accent, Font, Style, Opacity, Radius, Shadow, Shade and Background.

menuContentThemeStyleAutomaticDescriptio.message: Follow the system Light or Dark mode.

menuContentThemeColorShadeHelperPara1.message: Backgrounds, Bookmarks and Modals use shades from the left.

menuContentThemeColorShadeHelperPara2.message: Text and form elements use shades from the right.

menuContentThemeColorShadeHelperPara3.message: For a light look switch to the Light Style and then select a Primary colour. And vice versa for a dark look.

menuContentThemeColorContrastHelperPara1.message: Move the Contrast range controls close together for a muted look.

menuContentThemeColorContrastHelperPara2.message: Move the Contrast range controls far apart from each other for a sharp vivid look.

menuContentThemeAccentCycleAlert.message: Take care as a fast changing Accent hue may cause performance issues.

menuContentThemeAccentCycleHelperPara1.message: Auto change Accent hue will not work when the Accent colour is a grey or black.

menuContentThemeFontDisplayNameHelperPar.message: Use a Google Font to customise the Clock, Date, Group names and Bookmark Letters.
Add a font name as it appears on Google Fonts, including capital letters and spaces, eg: enter "Fredoka One" or "Kanit".
Clear the field to use the default font "Fjalla One".

menuContentThemeFontDisplayWeightHelperP.message: Not all fonts support all weights. Refer to the Google Font page to see which are available.

menuContentThemeFontUiNameHelperPara1.message: Use a Google Font to customise the Bookmark name, URL and form elements.

menuContentThemeFontUiNameHelperPara2.message: Add a font name as it appears on Google Fonts, including capital letters and spaces, eg: enter "Roboto", "Source Sans Pro" or "Noto Sans".

menuContentThemeFontUiNameHelperPara3.message: Clear the field to use the default font "Open Sans".

menuContentThemeFontUiWeightHelperPara1.message: Not all fonts support all weights. Refer to the Google Font page to see which are available.

menuContentThemeOpacityGeneralHelperPara.message: Change the opacity of Search bar, Bookmarks, Group controls and the Toolbar.
Opacity can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.

menuContentThemeBackgroundTypeThemeDescr.message: Use the Background colour defined by the Theme.

menuContentThemeBackgroundTypeAccentDesc.message: Use the Accent colour for the Background.

menuContentThemeBackgroundImageAlertPara.message: Local images can no longer be used. Images must be hosted somewhere online.

menuContentThemeBackgroundImageUrlHelper.message: Add more than one URL separated by spaces or on new lines for a random background image on load.
Unsplash can be used for random images, eg:
Change parameters after .../random/ for more options. Loading times may vary.

menuContentThemeBackgroundVideoAlertPara.message: YouTube page URLs can not be used.
How to link to a video file.

menuContentThemeBackgroundVideoUrlHelper.message: Background video only supports a direct URL to a video file. Supports MP4 and WebM format.
Add more than one URL separated by spaces or on new lines for a random background video on load.

menuContentThemeLayoutColorByTransparent.message: No background colour behind the Layout.

menuContentThemeLayoutColorByCustomDescr.message: Use a custom colour behind the Layout.

menuContentThemeLayoutDivider.message: Divider between Header and Bookmark area

menuContentThemeHeaderColorByTransparent.message: No background colour behind the Header area.

menuContentThemeHeaderColorByCustomDescr.message: Use a custom colour behind the Header area.

menuContentThemeBookmarkColorByTranspare.message: No background colour behind the Bookmark area.

menuContentThemeBookmarkColorByCustomDes.message: Use a custom colour behind the Bookmark area.

menuContentThemeBookmarkItemBorderHelper.message: Bookmark border can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.
The colour of the Border is defined by the Accent which can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.

menuContentThemeBookmarkItemRainbowAdd.message: Add unique accent to each Bookmark

menuContentThemeBookmarkItemRainbowHelpe.message: Bookmark custom Accent can also be changed when editing individual Bookmarks.

menuContentLayoutAreaHeaderJustifyHelper.message: Effects may not be visible if the Header Area is full width.
Only available when Layout Direction is Vertical and Header items are shown.

menuContentLayoutAreaBookmarkJustifyHelp.message: Effects may not be visible if the Bookmark Area is full width.
Only available when Layout Direction is Vertical and Header items are shown.

menuContentLayoutPadding.message: Space around Header and Bookmark Area

menuContentLayoutGutter.message: Space between Header and Bookmark items

menuContentLayoutDirectionHorizontalDesc.message: Stack the Header and Bookmarks in a row side by side.

menuContentLayoutDirectionVerticalDescri.message: Stack the Header and Bookmarks in a column one above the other.

menuContentLayoutOrderHeaderBookmarkDesc.message: Order the Header area to appear before the Bookmarks area.

menuContentLayoutOrderBookmarkHeaderDesc.message: Order the Bookmarks area to appear before the Header area.

menuContentLayoutPageOverscrollUnblurDes.message: Background image or video will unblur when scrolled to the bottom of the page.
Image or video blur can be found under Theme Background.

menuContentHeaderAlignmentHelperPara1.message: Effects may not be visible if the Search box size is set to Auto and grows to fill available space.

menuContentHeaderGreetingNewLineDescript.message: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

menuContentHeaderGreetingTypeNoneDescrip.message: Useful for displaying just the name.

menuContentHeaderGreetingTypeCustomDescr.message: Defaults to "Good morning..." if left blank.

menuContentHeaderTransitionalShowHelperP.message: Only available when Date or Time is shown.

menuContentHeaderTransitionalNewLineDesc.message: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

menuContentHeaderClockNewLineDescription.message: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

menuContentHeaderDateNewLineDescription.message: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

menuContentHeaderSearchWidthAutoDescript.message: Search box will grow to best fit available space.

menuContentHeaderSearchWidthCustomDescri.message: Define how wide the Search box should be inside the Header Area.

menuContentHeaderSearchNewLineDescriptio.message: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

menuContentHeaderSearchEngineCustomUrlHe.message: Enter a web address with the search parameters, eg: "https://vimeo.com/search?q="
{appName} will add the search term entered into the Search box at the end of the above URL.

menuContentHeaderSearchEngineCustomQuery.message: Sets the name attribute on the Search input field.
This defines the name passed to the search engine when submitting. If not sure leave blank.

menuContentHeaderSearchNewTab.message: Open Search results in a new tab

menuContentBookmarkGeneralShadowShowDesc.message: Effects may not be visible if Theme Shadow is set to 0.

menuContentBookmarkGeneralNewTab.message: Open Bookmarks in a new tab

menuContentBookmarkOrientationHelperPara.message: Display the URL and Controls either at the top or bottom of a Bookmark Tile.

menuContentGroupAlignmentOrderHeaderBody.message: Order the Group details area to appear before the Bookmarks area.

menuContentGroupAlignmentOrderBodyHeader.message: Order the Bookmarks area to appear before the Group details area.

menuContentGroupNameHelperPara1.message: Group Names can also be changed by editing individual Groups.

menuContentGroupToolbarCollapseHelperPar.message: Group toolbar collapse button can also be changed by editing individual Groups.

menuContentGroupToolbarOpenAllHelperPara.message: Group toolbar open all button can also be changed by editing individual Groups.

menuContentToolbarLocationHelperPara1.message: Position the Toolbar inside the Header or in a corner of the window.

menuContentToolbarLocationNewLineDescrip.message: Force on to a new line and seperate from other Header items.

menuContentToolbarLocationNewLineHelperP.message: Only available when the Toolbar is positioned inside the Header.

menuContentToolbarPositionHelper1Para1.message: Position the Toolbar in one of the four corners of the window.

menuContentToolbarPositionHelper2Para1.message: Only available when the Toolbar is positioned in a corner.

menuContentDataRestoreDrop.message: Or drop a {appName} backup file here.

menuContentDataBackupHelperPara1.message: Download a backup of your {appName} Bookmarks and Settings.

menuContentDataBackupHelperPara2.message: This file can later be imported on this or another deivce.

menuContentDataClearAlertPara.message: You will lose Bookmarks by clearing all data.

menuContentDataClearHelperPara1.message: Clear all data to reset {appName} to the default state.

menuContentDataClearHelperPara2.message: Alternatively, it is possible to wipe all settings but keep the current Bookmarks and Groups.

menuContentLanguageAlertPara.message: Found a translation that isn't right?

menuContentSupportPageBackgroundImageVid.message: Setting a background video or image

menuContentCoffeePara.message: {appName} is free, appreciation is welcome in the form of coffee!

menuContentAppPara1.message: Share your setup with the community.

bookmarkRemoveContent.message: Are you sure you want to remove this Bookmark? This can not be undone.

bookmarkFormSectionVisualDescription.message: Display Letters, Icon, Image and a Name on this Bookmark tile.

bookmarkFormSectionAddressDescription.message: Be sure to use the full URL and include "https://..."

bookmarkFormSectionPositionDescription.message: The Group to place this Bookmark in.

bookmarkFormSectionLayoutDescription.message: Change the Visual Element and Name position, scale and orientation.

bookmarkFormSectionThemeDescription.message: Override the Theme and Accent colour.

bookmarkFormDisplayDirectionVerticalDesc.message: Stack the Visual Element and Name one above the other.

bookmarkFormDisplayDirectionHorizontalDe.message: Arrange the Visual Element and Name side by side.

bookmarkFormDisplayOrderVisualNameDescri.message: Place the Visual Element before the Name.

bookmarkFormDisplayOrderNameVisualDescri.message: Place the Name before the Visual Element.

bookmarkFormDisplayVisualShowDescription.message: Display Letters, Icon or an Image on this Bookmark hexagon.

bookmarkFormDisplayVisualShadowHelperPar.message: Visual shadow only applies to a Letter or Icon.

bookmarkFormAccentByThemeDescription.message: Use the Accent defined by the Theme.

bookmarkFormColorByThemeDescription.message: Use the Color defined by the Theme.

bookmarkFormBackgroundShowDescription.message: Display an Image or video Background on this Bookmark tile.

bookmarkFormBackgroundImageHelperPara1.message: Background image only supports a direct URL to an image file.

bookmarkFormBackgroundVideoHelperPara1.message: Background video only supports a direct URL to a video file. Supports MP4 and WebM format.

bookmarkFormBackgroundVideoHelperPara2.message: YouTube page URLs can not be used.

bookmarkFormShapeWideDescription.message: Bookmark tile to span across two columns.

bookmarkFormShapeTallDescription.message: Bookmark tile to span across two rows.

bookmarkFormPropagateVisualLabel.message: Apply "Show Visual Element" and "Show Name" to other Bookmarks

bookmarkFormPropagateVisualDescriptionPa.message: The Letter, Icon, Image and Name text will not be shared.
Useful for hiding the Visual Elements or Names on all Bookmarks.

bookmarkFormPropagateLayoutDescriptionPa.message: When saved, apply the above Layout to all other Bookmarks.
Only the Visual and Name size, Alignment, Order, Position and Gutter will be applied to all.

bookmarkFormPropagateThemeDescriptionPar.message: When saved, apply the above Theme to all other Bookmarks.
Only the Color, Accent, Opacity, Border and Visual shadow will be applied to all.

groupAreaControlOpenAll.message: Open all bookmarks in this group

groupRemoveContent.message: Are you sure you want to remove this Group and all the Bookmarks within? This can not be undone.

groupFormSectionNameDescription.message: Display a Name above this Group.

groupFormSectionToolbarDescription.message: Display controls to open all or show/hide the Bookmarks in this Group.

groupFormCollapseShowDescription.message: The Collapse button will show or hide the Bookmarks in this Group.

groupFormOpenAllShowDescription.message: Open all button will appear if there is at least one Bookmark in this Group.

themeCustomRemoveContent.message: Are you sure you want to remove this saved custom theme? This can not be undone.

dataFormDescription.message: You can restore all or parts of a backup file. The following data will be restored:

dataFormBookmarkIncludeDescriptionPara1.message: This includes all Groups and Bookmarks

dataFormBookmarkIncludeDescriptionPara2.message: Bookmarks will keep any custom Colors, Accents and Borders when imported.

dataFormThemeIncludeDescription.message: This includes the Color, Accent, Fonts, Background and any saved Custom Themes.

dataFormSetupIncludeDescription.message: This includes Layout size and position, Header area size, Bookmark area size and other user settings.

dataClearAllContentPara1.message: Are you sure you want to clear all {appName} Bookmarks and Settings? {appName} will be restore to the default state.

dataClearPartialContentPara1.message: Are you sure you want to clear all {appName} Settings? {appName} will be restore to the default state but your Bookmarks and Groups will remain.

dataFeedbackFailNotJson.message: Not a JSON file. Make sure the selected file came from {appName}.

dataFeedbackFailNotAppJson.message: Not the right kind of JSON file. Make sure the selected file came from {appName}.

dataFeedbackFailNotClipboardJson.message: Not the right kind of data. Make sure the clipboard holds data from {appName} or a {appName} backup JSON file.
